org.apache.fop.image.loader.batik

Class ImageConverterWMF2G2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.xmlgraphics.image.loader.impl.AbstractImageConverter
      • org.apache.fop.image.loader.batik.ImageConverterWMF2G2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.xmlgraphics.image.loader.spi.ImageConverter

    public class ImageConverterWMF2G2D
extends org.apache.xmlgraphics.image.loader.impl.AbstractImageConverter
    This ImageConverter converts WMF (Windows Metafile) images (represented by Batik's WMFRecordStore) to Java2D.
